dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.greeting: Ready to tackle your legal matters? Your AI assistant is here to help.
dashboard.mattersComingSoon: Legal matters tracking is coming soon.
dashboard.archivedToast: The conversation has been moved to archives.
dashboard.deletedToast: The conversation has been permanently deleted.
dashboard.restoredToast: The conversation has been restored to active chats.

settings.title: Settings
settings.profileUpdated: Your profile has been updated successfully.
settings.dataPrivacyDesc: Your data is securely stored and never shared with third parties.
settings.signedOutDesc: You have been successfully signed out.

chat.disclaimer: This is an AI assistant. Please consult a qualified lawyer for legal advice.
chat.historyEmpty: History is empty. Let's start your first chat!
chat.welcome: Select a prompt, choose a past conversation, or write your own question below.

voiceChat.micErrorDesc: Unable to access microphone. Please check permissions.
voiceChat.processingErrorDesc: Failed to process voice input. Please try again.

auth.trialComplete: You've used all your free messages.
auth.benefits: Sign up to get unlimited access to:

lawyerFinder.title: Find Lawyers
lawyerFinder.locationError: Location access denied. Please enter your city or pincode.
lawyerFinder.noLawyersFound: No lawyers found. Try a different location or filter.

legalGuides.title: Legal Process Guides
legalGuides.description: Step-by-step guidance through common legal procedures

knowledgeBase.title: Legal Knowledge Base
knowledgeBase.description: Find answers to frequently asked legal questions
knowledgeBase.noResults: No questions found matching your search criteria.
knowledgeBase.disclaimer: Disclaimer: This information is for general guidance only. Laws vary by jurisdiction. Consult with a qualified attorney for advice specific to your situation.
knowledgeBase.ctaDescription: Our knowledge base provides general information. For personalized legal counsel, connect with a qualified attorney.

documentTemplates.title: Legal Document Templates
documentTemplates.description: Ready-to-use legal forms and document templates
documentTemplates.createDescription: Fill out the form below to generate your legal document.
documentTemplates.generatedToastDesc: Your legal document has been created and is ready for download.
documentTemplates.importantNotice: Important: These templates provide general forms and should be reviewed by a qualified attorney before use. Laws vary by jurisdiction and individual circumstances may require modifications.

documentTools.title: Document Tools
documentTools.description: Your all-in-one solution for document analysis and creation.

summary.title: Agreement Summary
summary.description: Get a concise summary of your document.

create.title: Create an Agreement
create.ctaDesc: This tool helps you generate agreements. For a full list of templates, please visit the "Legal Forms" section.
